urls.title: Delayed or Damaged Baggage | Singapore Airlines
urls.description: If your baggage is delayed or damaged, Singapore Airlines can help. We will work to get you the assistance you need and get your journey back on track.

data.text: @ayfajlalani You may also refer to https://t.co/KWuQCcsVaX for more information about damaged baggage. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. (2/2)

urls.title: Get help – Damaged or missing items in baggage | Singapore Airlines
urls.description: Fill out the form below to get help for damaged or missing items and we will get back to you within 4 working days.

data.text: @ayfajlalani We're sorry to hear this, Ayfaj. If your baggage was damaged, kindly lodge a report via https://t.co/LXLrViWQA6 for our colleagues in the relevant department to look into it. (1/2)

urls.title: Free Singapore City Tour | Singapore Airlines
urls.description: Capture the spirit of Singapore during your transit with our Free Singapore Tour. Choose from the two available routes that fits your flight schedule best and experience the sights, sound and colours of Singapore.

data.text: @theagarwal Hi Anuj, the Free Singapore Tour has been suspended with effect from 21 March 2020 till further notice. You may wish to keep a lookout for future updates via https://t.co/3TKeqIxco5. Thank you.
